text: Kurt Paul Schmitt (7 October 1886 in Heidelberg â€“ 2 November 1950 in Heidelberg) was a German economist and minister for economics of the Third Reich. He was also a member of Hitler's Cabinet. He fought in the First World War and got the Iron Cross. title: Kurt Schmitt
